an4.230:1.1: …pe… Assaddho hoti, dussilo hoti, kusito hoti, duppanno hoti …pe… saddho hoti, silava hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, pannava hoti—
an4.230:1.2: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati”ti.
